xho: ndiqondile ukuba ndifanelwe nje kukuba ndihlale ndinethemba.

eng: i was anxious, but i prayed and tried to relax," she said.
xho: bendixhalabile, kodwa ndathandaza ndazama nokuba ndizole," utshilo.

eng: "that place can save lives!
xho: "la ndawo ingayisindisa imiphefumlo!

eng: it really is the best," said john arnoldus, who recovered from covid19 at an isolation facility in drakenstein.
xho: ngokuyinene yeyona ingcono," utshilo ujohn arnoldus, noye walulama kwicovid19 kwiziko lokugcina bucala edrakenstein.

eng: "one of my friends was in quarantine at home and he struggled to recover on his own.
xho: "omnye wabahlobo bam ebezigcine bucala ekhaya kwaye kwabanzima ukuzifumanela ukululama ngokwakhe.

eng: i told him to contact the people who cared for me – that is the way to get better.
xho: ndiye ndamxelela ukuba makaqhagamshelane naba bantu babendinike inkathalelo – yeyona ndlela anokuba ngcono ngayo.

eng: the support of the medical staff and the manager there – that pulls you through," he said.
xho: inkxaso yabasebenzi bezempilo kunye nomphathi waphaya – ikwenza uphumelele," utshilo.

eng: arnoldus was initially hesitant to go to the isolation facility because of the wrong perception that if you go to a facility like this you will get sicker and die.
xho: uarnoldus ekuqaleni wayemadolwanzima ukuya kwiziko lokugcina bucala ngenxa yengcingane engalunganga yokuba ukuba ngaba uye kwiziko elifana neli uza kugula nangakumbi ugqibele ngokubhubha.

eng: "i expected the worst, but i was received so well.
xho: "bendilindele okona kubi, kodwa ndamkelwa ngezandla ezishushu.

eng: hats off to the staff!
xho: ndibothulela umnqwazi abasebenzi!

eng: they explained to me that as i already have covid19, no one at the facility could make me sick," he said.
xho: bandicacisela ukuba njengokuba sendinayo icovid19 , akukho mntu unokundenza ukuba ndigule kweli ziko," utshilo.

eng: what can you expect from a quarantine facility?
xho: kokuphi onokulindela kwiziko lokugcina bucala?

eng: according to the western cape government, all of your needs are taken of.
xho: ngokutsho korhulumente wasentshona koloni, zonke izidingo zakho zithathelwa ingqalelo.

eng: let’s keep each other safe vukuzenzele unnamed our country has moved to alert level 2 in our response to the coronavirus pandemic.
xho: masigcinane sikhuselekile vukuzenzele unnamed ilizwe lethu lehlele kwinqanaba lokulu mka lesi2 kwimpe ndulo yethu kubhu bhane wentsholongwa ne icorona .

eng: this has come as a relief to all south africans who have had to live under stringent restrictions for the last five months.
xho: oku kuni ke uninzi lwabantu basemzantsi afrika abe behlala phantsi kwemi qathango engqongqo kwezi nyanga zintlanu zidlulileyo isiqabu.

eng: it is a sign of the progress we are making in reducing new infections and demand on our health facilities.
xho: olu luphawu lwenkqubela esiyenzayo ekunciphiseni usuleleko olutsha nomthwa lo kumaziko wenkathalelo yezonyango wethu.

eng: it is also a very important development as we strive to restart our economy.
xho: ikwayi nkqubela phambili ebalu leke kakhulu njengokuba sizamela ukuqalisa ngoqo qosho lwethu.

eng: but it is too soon to celebrate.
xho: kodwa kusekutsha kakhu lu ukuba singakubhiyozela oku.

eng: we are still very much in the middle of a deadly pandemic that has taken over 11,000 lives in south africa alone.
xho: sisesembindini wobhubha ne obulalayo osele uthathe imiphefumlo engaphezulu kwe11 000 kumzantsi afri ka nje wodwa.

eng: at more than half a million confirmed cases, we still have the fifth highest number of infections in the world.
xho: kwizehlo zosuleleko ezingaphezulu kwesiqingatha sesigidi ezi ngqiniweyo, sisekwindawo yesihlanu ubuninzi bosule leko ehlabathini.

eng: and there is always a chance of a resurgence of the disease.
xho: kwaye akusoloko ekhona wona amathuba wokuba esi sifo singaphinda sivuke kwa khona.

eng: if we ever need a stark reminder of the need for vigilance, we should look to recent events thousands of kilometres away in new zealand.
xho: ukuba ngokuyinene sidi nga ukuzikhumbuza nge mfuno yokuba sihlale sipha phile, kufanele sikhangele kwizehlo zakutsha nje ku mgama ongamawaka nga mawaka weekilomitha kude le enew zealand.

eng: three months since the country was declared coronavirusfree, new zealand is once again under lockdown.
xho: kwisithu ba nje seenyanga ezintathu emva kokuba ela lizwe libhe ngezwe njengelingenayo intsholongwane icorona , inew zealand kwakhona ikwisimo sokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.

eng: although the latest outbreak was of relatively few cases, the government swiftly reimposed lockdown restrictions.
xho: nangona okwakutsha nje ukuqhambuka kwakho na kwale ntsholongwane kube zizehlo nje ezimbalwa, urhulumente ukhawulezise wamisela kwakhona imi qathango yokuvaleleka pha ntsi kwemiqathango ethile.

eng: similar restrictions have had to be reimposed in several parts of europe as they experience a ‘second wave’ of infections.
xho: imiqathango efanayo kuye kwanyanzeleka imiselwe kwakhona kwimimandla eliqela yaseyurobhu nje ngokuba baye beva ‘umsi nga wesibini’ wosuleleko.

eng: these experiences show just how swiftly things can change when it comes to covid19.
xho: la mava abonakalisa nje ukuba izinto zitshintsha msinya kangakanani na ngoku bhekisele kwicovid19 .

eng: it is a wakeup call to any among us who may harbour illusions that we are even close to seeing the end of this grave public health emergency.
xho: sisilumkiso eso kuye naba ni na onemibono yokubona into engekhoyo yokuba sesisondele esiphelweni sokuba kwimo enzima kaxa keka kumaziko wezempilo kawonkewonke.

eng: certainly, there are signs of hope.
xho: ngokuqinisekileyo, zikho na iimpawu zethemba zona.

eng: the number of new confirmed cases in south africa continues to decline.
xho: inani lezehlo ezitsha zosule leko ezingqiniweyo emza ntsi afrika ziyaqhubeka ukwehla.

eng: at the peak of the disease just one month ago, we were recording around 12,000 new cases a day.
xho: ngexesha sisenco tsheni yovuthondaba lwesi sifo kwinyanga nje enye edlu lileyo, besibhalisa malunga ne12 000 lezehlo ezitsha zo suleleko ngosuku.

eng: this has dropped to an average of around 5,000 a day over the past week.
xho: oku kuye kwehla kwafika kumyinge omalunga nama5 000 ngo suku kule veki idlulileyo.

eng: our recovery rate stands at 80 percent.
xho: izinga lethu lokuphucuka lumi kuma80 eepesenti.

eng: as the country moves to alert level 2, many restrictions on social and economic activity have been lifted.
xho: njengokuba ilizwe lehlele kwinqanaba lokulumka lesi2, imiqathango emi ninzi kwiintshukumo ze zolonwabo nezoqoqosho isusiwe.

eng: with this comes increased risk of transmission.
xho: oku kuhambelana nokwanda komngcipheko wokusasazeka.

eng: we now need to manage this risk and ensure the gains we have made thus far in containing the pandemic’s spread are not reversed.
xho: ngoku kufanele siwu lawule umngcipheko size siqinisekise ukuba iinzuzo esele sizizuzile ukuza ku tsho ngoku ekulawuleni ukunwena kwalo bhubhane asizibuyiseli mva.

eng: the greatest threat to the health of nation right now is complacency.
xho: esona soyikiso sikhulu kwimpilo yelungelo lesizwe ngoku kukwaneliseka.

eng: it may be that we are now permitted to meet friends and family, to visit entertainment venues, to travel for leisure and to consume alcohol in restaurants, bars and taverns.
xho: kuseno kuba sivumelekile ngoku ukuba sidibane nabahlobo neentsapho, siye kwiindawo zokuzonwabisa, sihambele ulonwabo nokusela utywala kwiindawo zokutyela, iibha ri neethaveni.

eng: but as the old adage goes, just because you can, doesn’t mean you should.
xho: kodwa ke njengoko lisi tsho iqhalo lakudala, into yokuba uyakwazi, ayithethi ukuba kufanele wenze.

eng: many people who have the coronavirus do not have symptoms and may not even know they are infected.
xho: uninzi lwabantu aba nentsholongwane icorona ababinazo iimpawu kwaye basenokungayazi nokuba bosulelekile.

eng: this is a sobering reality because it means that any of us could be infected right now and could unwittingly infect others.
xho: le yinyaniso ezolisayo kuba oku kuthetha ukuba nabani na apha kuthi usenokuba wosulelekile ngoku sithethayo kwaye usenokuba wosulela abanye engaqondanga.

eng: this is particular the case when visiting relatives, especially the elderly and those with preexisting medical conditions that render them vulnerable to infection.
xho: oku kungenzeka ngoku kodwa xa ehambele izihlobo, ingakumbi abantu abadala kunye nabo banezigulo abaphila nazo ezibenza babe sesichengeni sokosuleleka lula.

eng: it is also true for attending religious services or cultural activities.
xho: kukwayinyaniso uku ba naxa beye kwimisebenzi yezenkolo okanye yezenkcu beko.

eng: the ‘second wave’ of infections that several other countries have experienced is an everpresent possibility for us too.
xho: ‘umsinga wesibini’ wo suleleko athe amazwe ama ninzi awuva yinto eyaku hlala inokwenzeka nakuthi.

eng: although many restrictions have been lifted, it does not mean they will not return should we experience a significant rise in infections.
xho: nangona imiqathango emininzi irhoxisiwe, oko akuthethi ukuba ayinoku phinda ibuye xa sinoku phinda sehlelwe kukunyuka okukhulu kosuleleko.

eng: this pandemic is a matter of life and death.
xho: lo bhubhane yinto yokuphila nokufa.

eng: we need to adapt and we need to be vigilant.
xho: sidinga ukuziqhela nisa kwaye sidinga ukuba sihlale siphaphile.

eng: in the days, weeks and months that lie ahead, we must urgently focus our efforts on recovery.
xho: kwezi ntsuku, iiveki nee nyanga ezizayo, kufuneka sigxile ngokungxamiseki leyo kumalinge wethu oku phila.

eng: our economy and our society has suffered a great deal.
xho: uqoqosho noluntu lwethu luchaneke kakhulu.

eng: as we return to economic activity across almost all industries – and work to repair the damage done – we have a responsibility to not let our guard down as individuals, employers, communities, families, professionals, workers and citizens.
xho: njengokuba sibuyela kwii ntshukumo zezoqoqosho phantse kuwo onke ama shishini – nokusebenzela ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekileyo – sinoxanduva lokuba singayekeleli umxa katho umntu ngamnye, abaqeshi, uluntu, iintsapho, amagcisa ezemisebenzi, abasebenzi nabemi.

eng: none of us wants a return to the early days of extreme lockdown restrictions.
xho: akukho namnye kuthi ofu na ukubuyela kweza ntsuku zokuqala zemiqathango engqongqo yokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.

eng: we want to move on with our lives.
xho: sifuna ukuqhu bela phambili nobomi bethu.

eng: we want our friends and loved ones to remain healthy and safe.
xho: sifuna abahlobo bethu nabo sibathandayo bahlale bese mpilweni kwaye bekhuse lekile.

eng: as a nation, let us continue to work together to ensure that we progress.
xho: njengesizwe, masiqhubeke ukusebenza sonke uku qinisekisa ukuba siqhubela phambili.

eng: the move to alert level 2 of the lockdown is not a ‘free for all.’ the rules on social distancing, mask wearing, social gatherings and international travel remain.
xho: umthetho wokugcina umgama wokuqelelana, ukunxitywa kwesigqubu thelo sobuso, iindibano zolonwabo nohambo phakathi kwezizwengezi zwe usemile.

eng: our success rests on our ability to abide by these regulations and to ensure that we each behave carefully and responsibly.
xho: impumelelo yethu ixho mekeke kumandla oku kwazi ukuyithobela le mi miselo nokuqinisekisa ukuba siziphatha ngoku lumkileyo nangenkathalo umntu ngamnye kuthi.

eng: every time we are considering any form of nonessen tial activity, we should ask: what is the risk of infection to ourselves and to others?
xho: ngalo lonke ixesha sicinga ngokwenza imisebenzi enge nguwo undoqo, kufanele sizibuze ukuba: ungakanani umngcipheko wokosule leka kwethu nabanye?

eng: where there is a risk, even a slight one, it is better not to do it.
xho: apho kukho khona umngcipheko, nokuba umncinci kangaka nani na, kungcono ungabi sakwenza oko ubukucinga.

eng: let us proceed, as ever, with caution.
xho: masiqhubeni, ngobu lumko, obungaphezulu kunangaphambili.

eng: nsfas powered my dreams more matshediso the national student financial aid scheme (nsfas) has bridged the financial gap between karabo mashego (21) and his plan to further his studies.
xho: unsfas ufezekise amaphupha wam more matshediso iskimu soncedo lwezezimali sa bafundi sesizwe (unsfas) siwuvalile umsantsa phakathi ku kakarabo mashego (21) kunye nezicwangciso zokuqhubela phambili imfundo yakheumashego wasesebokeng kummandla wevaal egau teng uthi ebengasoze akwa zi ukuba nemali yokufunda kunye neyezinye iindleko ezihambelana nemfundo yasemva kwematriki ukuba ngaba ebengafumenanga nkxasomali yokufunda kunsfas.

eng: mashego of sebokeng in gauteng’s vaal area says he would not have managed to afford tuition fees and the other expenses that come with postmatric education had he not received a bursary from nsfas.
xho: "ukongeza apho, isibo nelelo senyanga nenyanga endisifumana kunsfas sindenza ndilale ndifunde ndihluthi," utsho.

eng: "in addition, the monthly allowance i receive from nsfas enables me to sleep and study on a full stomach," he says.
xho: umashego ngumfundi wonyaka wesithathu ofu ndela isidanga sezobunjineli bokwakha iindlela nee bhulorho kwidyunivesithi yasepitoli.

eng: "tuition fees are very expensive.
xho: "imali yokufunda ibiza kakhulu.

eng: for the course that i have chosen, i really could not afford to pay for a semester, never mind a single academic year," he explains.
xho: kwesi sifundo ndisikhethileyo, ngokwe nyani bendingakwazi uku hlawula imali yesiqingatha nje sonyaka wokufunda, andisathethi ke ngonyaka nje omnye wokufunda," ucacisa atsho.

eng: mashego matriculated in 2016 and was a top learner in his class, but had no means to pay for his studies.
xho: umashego uphumelele imatriki ngowama2016 kwaye ube ngoyena mfu ndi uphambili kwigumbi lakhe lokufunda, kodwa engenayo indlela yokuhla wulela izifundo zakhe.

eng: he successfully applied for funding from nsfas for the 2018 academic year.
xho: ufake isicelo senkxasomali ngokuyimpumelelo kunsfas sonyaka wokufunda wowama2018.

eng: "this gave me the opportunity to make my dream of studying engineering come true.
xho: "oku kundinike ithuba lokwenza ukuba iphupha lam lokwenza izifundo zobunjineli libe yimpume lelo.

eng: education plays a huge role in my personal development and it helps me to progress in all that i intend to achieve.
xho: imfundo idlala indima enkulu ekuphuhleni kwam njengomntu kwaye iyandi nceda ndiqhubele phambili kuko konke endinqwenela ukukuzuza.

eng: moreover, it empowers me to empower other people in my community and thus contribute to the economy of our country," mashego explains.
xho: ngaphezu kwa ko konke, indinika amandla okuxhobisa abanye abantu kuluntu endihlala nalo ize ngolo hlobo elo ibe ligalelo kuqoqosho lwelizwe sethu," ucacisa atsho umashego.

eng: "i urge young people to apply for nsfas funding because following your dream is not a free exercise, it needs funding, and nsfas will bridge that gap for you," he says.
xho: "ndibongoza abantu aba tsha ukuba bafake izicelo kwinkxasomali kansfas kuba ukulandela amaphu pha wakho asingumsebenzi wasimahla, udinga inkxasomali, kwaye unsfas uzakukuvalela lo msantsa.

eng: the minister of higher education, science and innovation, dr blade nzimande, has opened the nsfas 2021 application cycle for a period of four months, from 3 august to 30 november 2020. students from disadvan taged and workingclass backgrounds who wish to further their studies at any public technical and vocational education and training (tvet) college or university may apply.
xho: "umphathiswa weze mfundo ephakamileyo, ezobunzululwazi nobu chule, ugqi blade nzi mande, sele ekuvulele uku fakwa kwezicelo kunsfas zomjikelo wowama2021 isithuba seenyanga ezine, ukusukela ngomhla wesi3 kweyethupha ukuya ku mhla wama30 kweye nkanga yowama2020.

eng: to be eligible for nsfas funding, an applicant must be a south african citizen and come from a family with a combined annual household income of not more than r350 000. the household annual income for students with a disability should not be more than r600 000.
xho: abafundi abaphuma kwimvelaphi yabahlele lekileyo nodidi lwabantu abaphangelayo abafuna ukuqhubela phambili izifundo zabo kuyo nayiphi na ikholeji yobuchwephe she nemfundo yobizo no qeqesho (itvet) okanye idyunivesithi bangafaka izicelo.

eng: "in the current academic year, nsfas has funded over 700 000 students, 248 242 at tvet colleges and 481 339 at universities (students with registrations data).
xho: "kulo nyaka wemfu ndo sikuwo ngoku, unsfas uxhase abafundi abangaphezulu kwama700 0000, abangama248 242 kwiikholeji zetvet kunye nama481 339 kwiidyuni vesithi (abafundi abakhoyo kuvimba weenkcukacha zobhaliso).

eng: this is a 20 percent increase from the previous year when we compared registration data received in the same period of 2019 versus 2020," says minister nzimande.
xho: oku kukwanda okuzipesenti ezingama20 ukususela kunyaka opheli leyo xa sithelekisa novimba weenkcukacha zobhaliso ezifumanekileyo ngexesha elifanayo ngowama2019 xa umthelekise nowama2020," utsho umphathiswa unzi mande.

eng: nsfas accounts for 40 percent of the undergraduate population at universi ties and 70 percent at tvet colleges.
xho: unsfas umele ama40 eepesenti wabafundi abasa fundela izidanga zokuqala kwiidyunivesithi nama70 eepesenti kwiikholeji zetvet.

eng: v applicants must visit www.
xho: vusifaka njani isicelo abafakizicelo kufuneka betyelele kuwww.

eng: nsfas.
xho: nsfas.

eng: org.
xho: org.

eng: za and click on mynsfas.
xho: za baze bacofe kumy nsfas.

eng: they must create a mynsfas account, click the apply tab, answer the questions on screen and upload the required documents.
xho: kufuneka bazenzele iakhawunti kamynsfas , bacofe ithebhu kaapply, baphendula imibuzo ekwiskrini baze baqhoboshele amaxwebhu afunekayo.

eng: once that is done, they must click submit.
xho: xa begqibile, kufanele bacofe usubmit .

eng: after clicking submit, the application reference number will appear on the screen.
xho: emva kokucofa usubmit, inombolo yesalathiso yokufaka isicelo iza kuvela kwiskrini.

eng: the reference number will also be sent to the cellphone number and email address that the applicant provided.
xho: le nombolo yesalathiso iza kuthunyelwa nakwinombolo yeselula yakho kunye nakwidilesi yeimeyili umfa kisicelo ayinikezeleyo.

eng: applicants can use a cellphone, tablet or computer to apply.
xho: abafakizicelo bangasebenzisa iminxeba yeselula, itablethi okanye ikhompyutha ukufaka izicelo.

eng: the nsfas portal has undergone minor changes to make it easier to use and more secure.
xho: umnyango kansfas kwiqonga lothungelwano lomnathazwe ube neenguqu ezincinane ezithe zenziwa ukwenzela ukuba kube lula ukuwusebe nzisa kwaye ukhuseleke ngakumbi.

eng: new applicants need a copy of their id or birth certificate to register and create a profile on the mynsfas portal.
xho: abafakizicelo abatsha kufanele babe neekopi zamaxwebhu ezazisi (id) okanye izatifikethi zokuzalwa ukubhalisa nokufaka ibali elifutshane labo lobomi kumnyango wemynsfas .

eng: applicants with existing accounts need to log into their accounts – remember, only one profile per applicant is allowed.
xho: abafakizicelo abasele benazo iiakhawunti badinga nje ukuloga kuzo – khumbula, linye kuphela ibali elifutshane lobomi elivumelekileyo ngomntu ngamnye.

eng: protect our women and children vukuzenzele unnamed a year ago, almost to the day, thousands of wom en, men and children marched to parliament to protest against a spate of rapes and killings of women and girls.
xho: khusela amanina nabantwana vukuzenzele unnamed kunyaka ophelileyo, phantse ngolu suku, amawaka amanina, amadoda nabantwana benza umngcelele oya epalamente bekhalazela iziganeko zokudlwengulwa nokubulawa kwamanina namantombazana.

eng: at the time, the nation was reeling from the murders of uyinene mrwetyana, leighandre jegels, jesse hess and a number of other women who had lost their lives at the hands of brutal men.
xho: ngelo xesha, isizwe sasixhelekile kukubulawa kukauyinene mrwetyana, uleighandre jegels, ujesse hess kunye namanye amanina aphulukana nobomi bawo ebulawa ngamadoda anobundlobongela.

eng: from all social backgrounds, young and old, students and working women, the peaceful protesters held aloft placards that read ‘enough is enough’ and ‘am i next?’.
xho: abaqhankqalazi ababenoxolo, bephuma kwiindawo ngeendawo, bequka abancinci nabadala, abafundi kunye namanina asebenzayo, babephethe amaxwebhu amakhulu bewaphakamisele phezulu kwaye ayefundeka ngolu hlobo 'enough is enough' amanye ebhalwe ' am i next?'.

eng: the anguish and the anger was palpable that day.
xho: intlungu nomsindo zazibhalwe ebusweni babantu ngaloo mini.

eng: as i received their clearly articulated demands, it was clear to me that we needed to act urgently and with determination.
xho: njengokuba ndandifumana izikhalazo zabo ezicaciswe gca, kwakucacile kum ukuba kufuneka sithathe amanyathelo ngokungxamisekileyo nangokuzimisela.

eng: it was important to me that i did not respond with hollow words and empty promises.
xho: kwakubalulekile kum ukuba ndingaphenduli nje ndingadlulisi usana kunina xa ndibaphendula futhi ndenze nezithembiso endingazi kuzizalisekisa.

eng: a few days later, i called a joint sitting of parliament, where we announced a r1.6 billion emergency response action plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf).
xho: emva kwentsuku ezimbalwa, ndabiza indibano yezindlu zombini zepalamente, apho ndazisa isicwangciso sokusebenza esingxamisekileyo esasiza kutyabula isigidigidi seerandi esiyi1.6 sokulwa ubundlobongela obubhekiselele kwisini kunye nokubulawa kwamanina (igbvf).

eng: over the six months of its implementation, public spending in various government departments was reprioritised to support interventions for care and support for survivors, for awareness and prevention campaigns, to improve laws and policies, to promote the economic empowerment of women, and to strengthen the criminal justice system.
xho: kwezi nyanga zintandathu zokuqhuba kwesi sicwangciso, urhulumente woxule imali kumasebe ahlukeneyo ache; wayithumela kumaphulo okuncedisa kunakekelo nenkxaso yabo basinde kwintlungu yegbvf , kumaphulo okufundisa nokuthintela igbvf , okuphucu la imithetho nemigaqonkqubo, okukhuthaza ukuxhotyiswa kwamanina ngokwezoqoqosho nokwenza ngqingqwa nangcono icandelo lezolwaphulomthetho nobulungisa.

eng: and now we are on the cusp of the most farreaching legislative overhaul in the fight against gbvf.
xho: kwaye ngoku sekumbovu ukuba senze utshintsho olumandla kwimithetho yokulwa negbvf .

eng: three key bills relating to gbvf have been introduced in parliament recently.
xho: imithetho eyilwayo engundoqo emithathu enxulumene nobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini isanda kungeniswa epalamente.

eng: through the introduction of these bills, we are honouring the promise we made to the protestors last year and to all the women of this country.
xho: ngokungenisa le mithetho iyilwayo, sizalisekisa isithembiso esasenza kubaqhankqalazi kunyaka ophelileyo nakuwo onke amanina eli.

eng: the three amendment bills are designed to fill the gaps that allow some perpetrators of these crimes to evade justice and to give full effect to the rights of our country’s women and children.
xho: le mithetho iyilwayo mithathu yenziwe izilungiso ilungiselelwe kanye ukuvala izikhewu ezivumela abanye baba bophulimthetho ukuba bakwazi ukungaziva izithonga zomthetho futhi ifezekisa namalungelo amanina nabantwana belizwe lethu.

eng: these bills, once finalised, will help to restore the confidence of our country’s women that the law is indeed there to protect them.
xho: le mithetho iyilwayo, nje yakuba igqitywe, iya kunceda ukubuyisela ukuzithemba kwamanina elizwe lethu ukuba umthetho ukhona ngokwenene ukubakhusela.

eng: the first is the bill to amend the criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act.
xho: owokuqala ngumthetho oyilwayo owenza izilungiso kumthethosihlomelo womthetho wolwaphu lomthetho (amatyala esondo kunye nemicimbi enxulumene noko).

eng: this creates a new offence of sexual intimidation, extends the ambit of the offence of incest, and extends the reporting duty of persons who suspect a sexual offence has been committed against a child.
xho: oku kudala ityala elitsha lokugrogrisa ngokwesondo, kwandise izinto ezinokuqukwa kwityala lombulo, futhi kwandise nomsebenzi wokunika ingxelo wabantu abakrokrela ukuba ulwaphulomthetho ngokwesondo lwenziwe emntwaneni.

eng: it expands the scope of the national register for sex offenders (nrso) to include the particulars of all sex offenders.
xho: yandisa iinkcukacha ezifakwa kwirejista kazwelonke yabaphulimthetho ngokwesondo (inrso) zitsho ziquke iinkcukacha zabo bonke abaphulimthetho ngokwesondo.

eng: until now, it has only applied to sex offenders convicted of sex crimes perpetrated against children or persons with mental disabilities.
xho: kude kube ngoku, ibikade iquka kuphela abaphulimthetho abadlwengule abantwana okanye abantu abakhubazeke ngokwengqondo.

eng: the time an offender’s particulars must remain on the register has been increased, and those listed on the register will have to disclose this when they submit applications to work with vulnerable persons.
xho: ixesha apho iinkcukacha zomaphulimthetho ekufuneka zihlale kwirejista landisiwe, futhi abo bakule rejista kuya kufuneka bakuxele oku xa bethumela izicelo zokusebenza nabantu abasesichengeni.

eng: the bill also provides for the names of persons on the nrso to be publicly available.
xho: lo mthetho oyilwayo ukwavumela nokuba amagama abantu abakwinrsoapapashwe esidlangalaleni.

eng: the criminal and related matters amendment bill tightens, among others, the granting of bail to perpetrators of gbvf, and expands the offences for which minimum sentences must be imposed.
xho: umthethosihlomelo oyilwayo wezolwaphulomthetho kunye nemicimbi enxulumene nawo uyaqiniswa, phakathi kwezinyeizinto, ukunikwa ibheyile kwabo benzi begbvf , kwaye uyawandisaamatyala apho ezona zigwebo ziphantsi kufuneka zenziwe.

eng: the amendments impose new obligations on lawenforcement officials and on our courts.
xho: ezi zilungiso zibeka uxanduva olutsha kumagosa ogcinomthetho kunye nakwiinkundla zethu.

eng: when a prosecutor does not oppose bail in cases of gbv, they have to place their reasons on record.
xho: xa umtshutshisi engayiphikisi ibheyile kumatyala egbv , kufune ka izizathu zabo zibhalwe phantsi.

eng: unless a person accused of gbv can provide exceptional circumstances why they should be released on bail, the court must order their detention until the criminal proceedings are concluded.
xho: ngaphandle kokuba umntu otyholwa ngegbv unika izizathu ezi vakalayo zokuba kutheni kufuneka akhululwe ngebheyile, inkundla kufuneka iyalele ukuba bavalelwe lide ityala lixoxwe ligqitywe.

eng: in reaching a decision on a bail application, the courts are compelled to take a number of considerations into account.
xho: ukufikelela kwisigqibo malunga nesicelo sebheyile, iinkundla ziyanyanzeliswa ukuba zithathele ingqalelo izinto ezininzi.

eng: they include pretrial reports on the desirability of releasing an accused on bail, threats of violence made against a survivor, and the view of the survivor regarding his or her safety.
xho: ziquka iingxelo zaphambi kokumanyelwa kwetyala ngokunqwenela ukukhululwa komtyholwa ngebheyile, izoyikiso zobundlobongela ezenziwe kulowo ulixhoba, kunye nembono yexhoba malunga nokhuseleko lwakhe.

eng: when it comes to parole, a complainant or a relative of a deceased victim must be able to make representation to the parole board.
xho: xa kufikelelwa kwingqa wule, ummangali okanye isizalwane sexhoba elingasekhoyo kufuneka sikwazi ukwenza uluvo kwibhodi yengqawule.

eng: given the unacceptably high levels of intimate partner violence in our country, we have tightened the provisions of the domestic violence act.
xho: ngenxa yamanqanaba aphezulu ngokugqithisileyo obundlobongela obuphakathi kwabantu abazizinqandamathe kwilizwe lethu, siwenze ngqingqwa umthetho wobundlobongela basekhaya.

eng: domestic violence is now defined to cover those in engagements, dating, in customary relationships, and actual or perceived romantic, intimate or sexual relationships of any duration.
xho: ubundlobongela basekhaya ngoku buchaphazela nabo sele bevumelene ngokutshatana, bathandanayo, batshate ngokwesintu, kunye nabakrokrelwa ukuba bayathandana, babelana ngesondo, bayazana nokuba obo budlelwane bunexesha elingakanani na.

eng: the bill also extends the definition of ‘domestic violence’ to include the protection of older persons against abuse by family members.
xho: lo mthetho oyilwayo kwakhona ukwandisa inkcazo ‘yobundlobongela basekhaya’ ukuba buquke ukukhuselwa kwabantu abadala ekuxhatshazweni ngamalungu osapho.

eng: complainants will be able to apply for a protection order online.
xho: abamangali kufuneka bakwazi ukufaka isicelo sokhuseleko kwiintanethi.

eng: to prevent a scenario where perpetrators can hide past histories of domestic violence, an integrated repository of protection orders will be established.
xho: ukuthintela imeko apho abenzi bobubi benokuzifihla izinto ababezenze ngaphambili, kuza kubakho uluhlu olunabo bonke abantu ababekhe bakhutshelwa umyalelo wokukhuselwa yinkundla.

eng: the proposed amendments also oblige the departments of social development, basic education, higher education and health to provide certain services to survivors where needed and to refer them for sheltering and medical care.
xho: ezi zilungiso zicetywayo zikwanyanzela isebe lezophuhliso loluntu, elezemfundo esisiseko, elezemfundo ephakamileyo kunye nelezempilo ukuba anikezele ngeenkonzo ezithile kumaxhoba apho zifuneka khona aze awathumele kwindawo yokuhlala nonyango.

eng: the circumstances under which a prosecutor can refuse to institute a prosecution when offences have been committed under the amended act or to withdraw charges when it involves the infliction of bodily harm or where a weapon was used to threaten a complainant have been limited.
xho: zimbalwa ngoku iimeko aphoumtshutshisi anokwala ukutshutshisa xa amatyala enziwe phantsi komthetho ohlaziyiweyo okanye ukurhoxiswa kwezityholo ezibandakanywa ukwenzakaliswa komzimba okanye apho kusetyenziswe isixhobo ukugrogrisa ummangali.

eng: in perhaps the most groundbreaking proposed amendment to the act, if someone has knowledge, reasonable belief or suspicion that an act of domestic violence has been committed against a child, a person with disability or an older person and fails to report it to a social worker or police officer they can be fined and even imprisoned.
xho: esona silungiso sicetywayo sigqibeleleyo salo mthetho, kukuba ukuba umntu unolwazi, inkolelo efanelekileyo okanye urhano lokuba isenzo sobundlobongela basekhaya senziwe emntwaneni, umntu okhubazekileyo okanye umntu omdala futhi othe wasilela ukusixela kunontlalontle, okanye kwipolisa banokuhlawuliswa kwaye bade bavalelwe entolongweni.

eng: similarly, failure by a member of the saps to comply with their obligations under the act will be regarded as misconduct and must be reported to the civilian secretariat for police service.
xho: ngokunjalo, ukusilela kwelungu lesaps ukwenza umsebenzi walo ngokwalo mthetho kuya kuthathwa njengokuziphatha gwenxa futhi kufuneka kunikwe ingxelo kwicandelo loonobhala boluntu lenkonzo yamapolisa.

eng: woza matrics launched dale hes this year’s ma triculants have to faced considerable challenges because of the coronavirus disease (covid19).
xho: ukuqalwa kwewoza matrics dale hes inkqubo yewoza matrics ijolise ekuncedeni bonke abafundi bematriki ukuba baphumelele iimviwo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

eng: the department of basic education (dbe) has ensured that the safe reopening of schools is one of its top priorities, along with supporting learners with various programmes to help them successfully complete the academic year.
xho: abafundi bematriki balo nyaka bajongene nemingeni emikhulu ngenxa yesifo sentsholongwane icorona (icovid19).

eng: one of these is the woza matrics programme, which was launched on 1 september in collaboration with a number of broadcasting partners and educational experts.
xho: isebe lemfundo esisiseko liqinisekisile ukuba ukuvulwa okukhuselekileyo kwezikolo yenye yezinto eziphambili nezibalulekileyo kulo, kunye nokuxhasa abafundi ngeenkqubo ezahlukileyo zokubanceda ukuba bawugqibe lo nyaka wezifundo ngempumelelo.

eng: as part of the programme, catchup lessons on six key matric subjects are being aired on sabc, dstv and openview (channel 122) every day for 12 weeks, from 8am to 10am and 1pm to 3pm.
xho: enye yezi yinkqubo yewoza matrics, eza kuqaliswa ngomhla woku1 kweyomsintsi ngentsebenziswano namahlakani ezosasazo amaninzi kunye neengcali kwezemfundo.

eng: the goal is to help learners to prepare for their final exams.
xho: iinjongo kukunceda abafundi ukuba balungiselele iimviwo zokuphela konyaka.

eng: the platform also provides live lessons, during which learners can ask teachers questions.
xho: eli qonga likwabonelela ngezifundo ezisasazwa ngqo, apho abafundi banokubuza ootitshala imibuzo.

eng: exam tips are also provided.
xho: iingcebiso zeemviwo nazo zikhona.

eng: woza matrics recognises that while all learners have lost school time, grade 12s have been the most severely affected, as their marks are extremely important for their career and university acceptance.
xho: iwoza matrics iqaphele uku ba nangona bonke abafundi bephulukene nexesha lesikolo, abafundi bebanga le12ngabona bathe bachaphazeleka kakhulu, njengoko amanqa ku abo ebaluleke kakhulu ku makhondo abo nakumathuba okwamkelwa edyunivesithi.

eng: basic education minister angie motshekga says the programme is vital, considering the disruption to learn ing caused by covid19.
xho: umphathiswa wemfundo esisiseko uangie motshekga uthi le nkqubo ibaluleke kakhulu, njengokuba kubekho ukuphazamiseka kwizifundo okubangelwe yicovid19 .

eng: "matric is always stressful, but 2020 has been filled with unusual stresses.
xho: "abafundi bematriki basoloko bekuxinzelelo, kodwa unyaka wama2020 unezinto ezininzi ezibangela uxinzelelo ezingaqhelekanga.

eng: i want to congratulate all our grade 12 learners and their families for their perseverance and determination.
xho: ndifuna ukuvuyisana nabafundi bebanga le12 kunye neentsapho zabo ngonyamezelo kunye nokuzimisela.

eng: it is abundantly clear that additional support is required for learners and we will continue to provide this.
xho: kucace gca ukuba inkxaso eyongezelekileyo iyafuneka kubafundi kwaye siya kuqhuba nokubanika.

eng: there are a few months left before the end of the year and woza matrics will give learners the support they need to prepare for the final exams," she says.
xho: kushiyeke iinyanga ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuba unyaka uphele futhi iwoza matrics iza kunika abafundi inkxaso abayidingayo ukulungiselela iimviwo zokuphela konyaka," utshilo.

eng: the programme is unique in that it targets the majority of grade 12s in the country who do not have regular access to the internet and connected digital devices.
xho: le nkqubo yahlukile kuba ijolise kwinkoliso yabafundi bebanga le12 kwizwelonke abangenayo iintanethi kunye nezixhobo zokuqhagamshelana zobuchwepheshe.

eng: broadcasts will be available to view by most of the 1.2 million learners who are writing matric exams in november.
xho: usasazo luza kufumaneka ukuba lubukelwe luninzi lwabafundi abasisigidi esi1.2 abaza kubhala iimviwo zematriki kweyenkanga.

eng: the council of education ministers has urged all learners and parents to make use of the platform.
xho: ibhunga labaphathiswa bezemfundo libongoza bonke abafundi nabazali ukuba balisebenzise eli qonga.

eng: sabc ceo madoda mxakwe says the broadcaster is proud to be part of the initiative.
xho: umphathi oyintloko wakwasabc umnu madoda mxakwe uthi eli qumrhu losasazo liyazingca ngokuba yinxalenye yeli phulo.

eng: "we are pleased to be one of the key roleplayers in saving the 2020 matric year.
xho: "siyavuya ukuba ngomnye wabadlala indima ephambili ekuqinisekiseni ukuba unya ka wama2020 wematriki awuhambi nje.

eng: as a public service broadcaster, we are dutyb ound to ensure that our content includes a significant number of educational programmes, particularly during a period when it is most needed.
xho: njengequmrhu losasazo loluntu, sinyanzelekile ukuba siqinisekise ukuba iinkqubo zethu zosasazo ziquka iinkqubo ezininzi ezinemfundiso, ingakumbi ngexesha apho oku kuyimfuneko kakhulu.

eng: "your questions answeredwhat subjects will be covered?
xho: "imibuzo yakho iphendulekilezeziphi izifundo eziza kwenziwa?

eng: maths geography life sciences physical sciences accounting maths literacy.
xho: imaths igeography ilife sciences iphysical sciences iaccounting imaths literacy.

eng: why were these time slots chosen, because learners could be at school?
xho: kutheni kukhethwe la maxesha, ngoba abafundi bangabasesikolweni ngala maxesha?

eng: school attendance times vary across districts and provinces, due to social distancing measures.
xho: amaxesha okuya esikolweni ahlukile kwizithili nakumaphondo jikelele, ngenxa yamanyathelo okungasondelelani kwabantu.

eng: many matrics will be at home at the time of broadcasting.
xho: uninzi lwabafundi bematriki baza kuba semakhaya ngexesha losasazo lwezifundo.

eng: a small percentage of learners are also being homeschooled.
xho: abafundi abambalwa bafundela emakhaya.

eng: the main broadcasts will be repeated after 4pm on openview and are available on dstv catchup.
xho: usasazo olubalulekileyo luza kuphindwa ngentsimbi ye4 malanga kwiopenview futhi luyafumaneka kudstv catchup .

eng: why only matrics?
xho: kutheni abafundi bematriki kuphela?

eng: matrics are under the most pressure to plan their postschool lives.
xho: abafundi bematriki baphantsi koxinzelelo olukhulu lokucwangcisa ubomi babo emva kokuba besigqibile isikolo.

eng: matrics have faced more significant disruption to their schooling since march 2020 because their curriculum was not shortened.
xho: abafundi bematriki bajongene nokuphazamiseka okumandla kwimfundo yabo ukususela kweyokwindla 2020 kuba ikharityhulamu yabo ayinqunyulwanga.

eng: matrics have fallen the furthest behind on curricu lum learning.
xho: abafundi bematriki basemva kakhulu ngezifundo ngokwekharityhulamu.

eng: where can i find the viewing schedule?
xho: ndingayifumana phi ishedyuli yokujonga?

eng: the viewing schedule is available in tv guides and on the woza matrics website at wozamatrics.co.za.
xho: ishedyuli yamaxesha osasazo iyafumaneka kwisikhokelo setv kunye nakule webhusayithi yewoza matrics ethi wozamatrics.co.za.

eng: repeat broadcasts will be available.
xho: usasazo oluphindwayo nalo luza kubakhona.

eng: is support being provided to parents and teach ers?
xho: ingaba abazali kunye notitshala bayayinikwa inkxaso?

eng: yes.
xho: ewe.

eng: the broadcast schedule will have some sessions on tips for parents on ways to support their matric children.
xho: ishedyuli yosasazo iza kuba neeseshoni zeengcebiso zabazali ngeendlela zokuxhasa abantwana babo abenza imatriki.

eng: some sessions will focus on teachers and the dbe's teacher connect whatsapp platform will communicate key messages to teachers.
xho: ezinye iiseshoni ziza kujolisa kootitshala futhi iteacher connect whatsapp yesebe lemfundo esisiseko iza kuthumela imiyalezo ebalulekileyo kootitshala.

eng: will there be a focus on dealing with the stresses faced by matrics?
xho: ingaba kuya kugxilwa ekujonganeni noxinzelelo abafundi bematriki abajamelana nalo?

eng: yes.
xho: ewe.

eng: court support for gbv victims more matshediso if you have suffered genderbased violence (gbv) and are in need of support at court, the national prosecuting authority (npa) has a specialised service to assist you.
xho: inkundla ixhasa amaxhoba egbv more matshediso ukuba uye waba lixhoba lobundlobongela obubheki sele kwisini (igbv) kwaye udinga inkxaso enkundleni, igunyabantu lezotshutshi so lesizwe (inpa) linenkonzo ekhethekileyo yokuku nceda.

eng: the ke bona lesedi court preparation programme is available at most sexual offences courts and other courts that deal with gbv.
xho: inkqubo yeke bona lesedi court preparation iyafumaneka kuzo zonke iinkundla zamatyala ezesondo nezinye iinkundla ezijongene negbv .

eng: ke bona lesedi means ‘i see the light’ when translated from setswana.
xho: ike bona lesedi ithetha ukuba ‘ndibona ukukhanya’ xa iguqulwa isuswa kwisetswana.

eng: a gbv victim can submit a request to the npa for assistance.
xho: ixhoba legbv lingangenisa isicelo sokuncedwa kwinpa.

eng: the senior public prosecutor or court preparation manager will then identify an appropriate court preparation officer to assist.
xho: umtshutshisi oyintloko woluntu okanye umphathi wokulungiselela inkundla uza kukhetha igosa lokulungiselela inkundla elifanelekileyo ukulinceda.

eng: "the service does not promise a particular outcome in the case and each individual’s experience is unique.
xho: "inkonzo ayithembisi isiphumo esithile setyala kwaye amava omntu ngamnye ahlukile.

eng: nonetheless, it assists with empowerment and restoring the victim’s dignity," says a statement from the npa.
xho: nangona kunjalo, koko inceda ngokulixhobisa futhi libuyisele isidima sexhoba," itsho ingxelo evela kwinpa.

eng: there are 161 court preparation officers at various courts across the country.
xho: kukho amagosa wokulungi selela inkundla ali162 kwiinkundla ezahlukileyo kwisizwe jikelele.

eng: the service is one of various initiatives introduced by government to deal with the scourge of gbv.
xho: le nkonzo yenye yamanyathe lo ahlukileyo aziswa ngurhu lumente ukulwa nesihelegu segbv .

eng: according to the npa, the complainant, victim, survivor or witness will be contacted by a court preparation officer from the court where she or he will testify.
xho: ngokwenpa, ummangali,ixhoba, osindileyo okanye ingqina kuza kuqhagamshelwana nalo ligosa lokulungiselela inkundla elivela kwinkundla apho kufuneka anike ubungqina.

eng: the court preparation officer will be available to support the complainant at court and throughout the trial.
xho: igosa lokulungiselela inkundla liza kubakhona ukunika inkxaso kummangali enkundleni lide liphele ityala.

eng: specialised tools and techniques are used to visually show the victim that she or he is heard, protected and respected.
xho: izixhobo ezikhethekileyo kunye nobuchule ziyasetyenziswa ukubonisa ixhoba ukuba liyamanyelwa, likhuselwe lize lihlonitshwe.

eng: complainants can speak in their own language and the court preparation officer will ensure that the victim is referred for counselling or therapy, to complete their healing journey.
xho: abamangali bangathethaulwimi lwabo futhi igosa elilungiselela inkundla liza kuqinisekisa ukuba ixhoba lithunyelwa kuncedo lweengcebiso okanye unyango, ukuqinisekisa ukuba bayaphila ngokwenene.

eng: many women and children who have suffered gbv, for example, rape, are anxious about going to court to testify and relate intimate details of events in front of strangers.
xho: abasetyhini abaninzi nabantwana abathe bahlaselwa kwigbv , umzekelo, ukudlwengulwa, baba nexhala lokuya kungqina enkundleni futhi babalise iinkcukacha ezifihlakeleyo zesehlo phambi kwabantu abangabaziyo.

eng: this service will help them feel more at ease.
xho: le nkonzo iza kunceda ukuba bazive bekhululekile.
